price: Ƙọ̄f. (Allāhu ló mọ ohun tí Ó gbàlérò pẹ̀lú àwọn háràfí náà.)¹ (Allāhu fi) al-Ƙur’ān alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé búra.
footnotes: 1. Ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah al Baƙọrah; 2:1.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
